Summary: Strange object that appeared in the movie "Patton"
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were watching the movie Patton on NetFlix and noticed a strange object that appeared in the sky during one of the scenes. The red dot is not the object we saw but is the reflection of our recording device that appears on our computer's screen. The object appears at approximately the 28:45 mark of the movie located in the sky of the upper right hand portion of the screen. Attached is a crude video we made of the movie as shown from our laptop computer.
